title: How can I get the Vandal Gragas skin?
body:
I've been trying to get a particular skin for Gragas since December of last year, 

It was available for a short period but I had no RP to get it,

Does anybody know when it might be available again?

{{champion:79}}

replies.body: Vandal Gragas is a[ Legacy Skin](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins#h1q5), meaning it only returns to the store on occassion.  When he's not available through the store, you still have a chance of finding legacy skins through mystery gifting and hextech chests.  Otherwise, bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page should anything come up!

Ah, I see..
Thanks so much for answering!
he is always avaible through hextech, I think it will take some time until he is in a bundle again if he will get one again
